did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Kenya. Ministry of Planning and National Development.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: District development plans for specific districts in Kenya; reports from various individuals on planning topics.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: District development plans for specific districts in Kenya, 1974-1978, 1979-1983, and 1984-1988; project reports, 1986-1991; reports from various individuals on planning topics including training, information systems, employment, food shortages, rural-urban policy and development, demography, arid and semi-arid land development, and financial aspects; and project reports. Participants included Ward Henevelt, John M. Cohen, Richard M. Hook, F.D. Van Buer, A.U. Wandera, Emery Roe, Marcia L. Odell, Alan G. Johnston, Klaus Bethke, Clay G. Westcott, Sid Saltzman, Judith Geist, David B. Lewis, Hugh E. Evans, George Ruigu, Barclay G. Jones, Peter Weisel, R.W. Machina, John Carlsen, and John T. Saywell.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Kenya. Ministry of Planning and National Development. Kenya Rural Development Project Reports, #4336. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

unittitle.extref: Link to a partial finding aid.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
